item.title: Collective Juice
item.description: -- COLLECTIVE JUICE Interaction Design | 2018, Academic Work Overview Convert people’s responses to questions into collective drinks Phase Concept, Design, Build, Deliver, Evaluate Period 10/2018 (4 weeks) Team Researcher(Me), Professor Role Researcher Method Iterative Ideation from 1D to 5D Technology Arduino, processing Output Physical prototype Objective How might we collect responses to questions that can only be answered by humans efficiently? Everyday we are googling many questions and we can get answer immediately.

item.title: Organic Sound Visualizer
item.description: Organic Sound Visualizer Programming as Performance | 2018, Academic Work Concept How might we make the experience of listening music more organic? Phase Concept, Design, Build Period 10/2018 (1 Week) Team Sole Project Role Maker, Coder Method Iterative coding Technology html5, css3, javascript, three.js Output [Link] Demo is here

item.title: LimpiDual Touch
item.description: -- LIMPIDUAL TOUCH Interaction Design | 2009, Academic Work Overview Designed and proposed interactive limpid display with dual-sided touch sensing. I’ve proposed the emerging interactive transparent display named ‘‘LimpiDual Touch’’. Users can operate from the rear side of the screen while seeing both displayed images and their fingers. This feature resolves a finger occlusion problem. Additionally, LimpiDual Touch also works for multiple users. Two users can share an identical display from both sides and control displayed objects at one time.
